action.action-desc: Mr. Thompson of Pennsylvania (for himself and Mr. LaMalfa) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Mineral Leasing Act to repeal provisions relating only to the Allegheny National Forest.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Cooperative Management of Mineral Rights Act of 2015.

section.header: Repeal of provisions regarding the Allegheny National Forest
section.text: Subsection (o) of section 17 of the Mineral Leasing Act (30 U.S.C. 226) and 2508 of the Energy Policy Act of 1992 (Public Law 102â€“486; 106 Stat. 3108) are repealed.
